title: Crime Alert 03.01.19
itunes:title: Crime Alert 03.01.19
description:
Mom and daughter face charges after allegedly murdering five family members, then telling police the victims wanted to die. Legal woes continue for disgraced singer R. Kelly. And in Nevada, federal lawsuit filed aimed at ending the state’s legal prostitution industry. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
